message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $180.  I'm confident you won't find a better deal on something of this quality.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
